ModMetaData.name: Faux's Icon Anthology Forked Collection
ModMetaData.author: Dutchman
ModMetaData.description:
[i]A collection of [b]21[/b] generic-themed HD (512px*512px) icons for RimWorld ideoligions.[/i]
[h2]Icon Anthologies[/h2] Each Icon Anthology aims to feature a collection of 21 themed icons for creating custom ideoligions. Each anthology will centre on a single theme, allowing you to pick and choose which themes you want for your ideoligions (or choose them all!)
[h2]Other Recommended Mods[/h2] [url=https://steamcommunity.com/workshop/filedetails/?id=1678847247]Graphics Settings+[/url] - All the icons should be displayed in crisp HD. If you experience blurriness, this mod should remedy that. This mod will also improve the quality of all other graphics introduced by mods and is a good companion to the Icon Anthologies.
